name: Keep On The Path - A Fast Game of Reflexes
name_original: Keep On The Path - A Fast Game of Reflexes
description:
Are you ready to explore a brand new game that will test your skills? Then brace yourself and dive into a world of fun so Keep on the Path can take you on a journey unlike any other. With a twisted path that constantly changes, you will love the challenge that this exciting game has to offer. Use your finger to guide the ball along the path as quickly as you can because the farther you go, the more points you score!

Fun and excitement is guaranteed when you download this addictive game. Keep on the Path is the perfect game to play so you can add a little pleasure to a boring day. Try to predict the direction of the path so you can know which way to go. Your kids will experience nothing but delight when they hear about this fun and addictive game. Keep on the Path is just a click away!
